EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2019-01-09 Takeaways on Gartner Conference 2018.ES-2019-01-07 Last Chance.Wh
EmailTemplate.subject: See you Wednesday?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-gartner-conference-2018/?utm_campaign=70157000001j51RAAQ]]> Gartner predicts that, by 2020, 75% or organizations will experience business disruptions due to infrastructure and operations skill gaps. Now is the time to prepare your organization with the right strategy and resources to ensure a successful digital transformation.
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-gartner-conference-2018/?utm_campaign=70157000001j51RAAQ]]>
This Wednesday, January 9th at 11 am ET, attend our "Gartner Cloud Strategies Conference Takeaways Webinar <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-gartner-conference-2018/?utm_campaign=70157000001j51RAAQ]]>", for a summary of Gartner's latest I&O thought-leadership, including:
- Top trends impacting digital infrastructures - Defining and implementing enterprise cloud strategies - Best practices in cloud management
By the end of this 30-minute live webinar, you'll see how to formulate and drive your cloud strategies forward. Register now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-gartner-conference-2018/?utm_campaign=70157000001j51RAAQ]]>.
PRESENTED BY
Bob Wambach VP of Product Marketing and Gartner IOCS attendee Turbonomic
SCHEDULING CONFLICT? We've got you covered. Register for the live event and you'll receive the recording shortly afterward.
